template<typename VertexType>
const char * speedtree::TreePartRenderData< VertexType >::oldRead ( const char *  data  ) 

Deserialises render data from the block of memory passed as argument.

Assumes the data was saved using the write() function.

See also:
write(), read()
Parameters:
data pointer to block of memory where to read data from.
Returns:
one byte past the last byte read.

template<typename VertexType>
int speedtree::TreePartRenderData< VertexType >::oldSize (  )  const

Computes the total space required to serialise the render data stored by this object.

See also:
write(), read()
Returns:
total space required (in bytes).

Lod data: 1 x lod num (m) 4 bytes m x vertices size (n) 4 bytes vertices data n * sizeof(vetextype) bytes strips num (o) 4 bytes o x strip size (p) 4 bytes strip data p * 2 bytes

4 + m * ( (4+n*sizeof(VertexType) + (4+o * (4+p*2)))

Texture maps: diffuse map filename length (q) 4 bytes diffuse map filename q bytes normal map filename length (r) 4 bytes normal map filename r bytes

template<typename VertexType>
char * speedtree::TreePartRenderData< VertexType >::oldWrite ( char *  pdata  )  const

Serialises the render data stored by this object into the block of memory passed as argument.

Assumes there is enough space in the memory block provided (as returned by the size() function).

See also:
size(), read()
Parameters:
pdata pointer to block of memory where to write data to.
Returns:
one byte past the last byte written.

total space required (in bytes).
